revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Box of bullets | class = BoxOfBullets | game = Strife | doomednum = 2048 | spawnid = 139 | spawnname = T_AMMOBOX | convid = 180, 174, 178 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→[[Classes:ClipOfBullets|ClipOfBullets]]→BoxOfBullets
Strife's box of bullets contains five times the amount of ammunition for the [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]] as a [[Classes:ClipOfBullets|clip]] does. Not to be confused with Doom's own [[Classes:ClipBox|box of bullets]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BoxOfBullets : {{Class|ClipOfBullets}} { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 50 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_BOXOFBULLETS" // "Ammo" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_BOXOFBULLETS" // "You picked up the box of bullets." States { Spawn: BBOX A -1 Stop } }
